item.title: Failure Resume
item.description: Since I am not the [[My Hero Academics|hero type]], might as well be my own anti-heroðŸ¤¡ 2022 Rejected by LLNL without a second round for a postdoc position Paper on [[prj-eqsim|seismicity modeling]] got rejected by GRL Failed the interview of a postdoc position in Uni Plymouth 2021 Didn’t go to any conference 2020 Attend the text-based EGU to present the [[prj-tempmatch|NZ seismicity project]] and got next-to-zero response.

item.title: My Hero Academics
item.description: Self-promotion is something I struggle with for as long as I have memories. Imagine how bad I usually feel in a conference.
